text: Yeah I never found a solution for that. I also need them to cancel their subscription when they uninstall the app so we don't keep charging them, because that could hurt us
<@U01QVR44MEY> is it part of the new project tools that you showed me?
agreed <@U03JDEHCX17> - i think Subscription APIs may be available in the not-too-distant future, but i'm less sure on the activation webhooks :confused:
